content: I suggest you contact the addon developer, as addons are not supported by Thunderbird. It appears the last update was done in2023.
creator: davidsk

content: This is your third post on this topic, and you never responded to my request for information from your last post. PLEASE keep your issues within the original post to avoid confusion and any wasted time of volunteers.
creator: davidsk

content: Please provide more information on why this is a Thunderbird issue. Google is known to use popups for verification. Maybe I'm missing something here. Thank you.
creator: davidsk

content: First, when posting a problem here, please stay with the same thread for continuity and not start new post when you reply. I asked for clarification on the issue and it is still not understood. From your post, you can receive mail in Thunderbird. Mail is possible to still be received in Windows Live Mail if that account is still active. Are the messages not appearing in Thunderbird? If messages are being received by Windows Live Mail and not by Thunderbird, it could be an error in configuration, or possibly a POP account wherein Live Mail downloads the messages and then deletes them, causing thunderbird to not receive them.
creator: davidsk
